data.actual_result: The device tries to autocorrect what is typed.
data.expected_result: When typing in hiragana it should load properly.
data.short_description: When using hiragana in an @ mention, it does not populate properly due to autocorrect.
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on mention and try to use @mention, Japanaese hiragana can't display/show correctly. - Hiragana always appears incorrectly. - When typing "ともやん", it shows like "とmお".
